# Human-AI Collaboration Handbook
> Principles for effective human-AI collaboration at Turtleand

## Start Here
- [Welcome](https://handbook.turtleand.com/)

## Mindset
- [Your Assumptions Expire Fast](https://handbook.turtleand.com/mindset/ai-innovation-accelerates/)
- [Today's Models Are the Worst](https://handbook.turtleand.com/mindset/todays-models-worst/)
- [Validate and Steer](https://handbook.turtleand.com/mindset/navigator-not-passenger/)
- [Seek a Plurality of Voices](https://handbook.turtleand.com/mindset/plurality-of-voices/)
- [Always Invite AI to the Table](https://handbook.turtleand.com/mindset/invite-ai/)
- [Human Strength Is the Intent](https://handbook.turtleand.com/mindset/human-strength-is-intent/)

## Workflow
- [Automated First Pass, Human Final Review](https://handbook.turtleand.com/workflow/automated-first-pass/)
- [Reduce the Human Bottleneck](https://handbook.turtleand.com/workflow/voice-first/)
- [Plan Before You Build](https://handbook.turtleand.com/workflow/plan-before-execution/)
- [Agents Scan, Humans Verify](https://handbook.turtleand.com/workflow/agents-scan-for-errors/)

## Economics
- [Give People the Best Models](https://handbook.turtleand.com/economics/give-people-the-best-models/)

## Quality
- [Quality Is Iterations](https://handbook.turtleand.com/quality/iterations-are-the-ceiling/)
- [Understanding Preserves Optionality](https://handbook.turtleand.com/quality/preserve-understanding/)

## Organizational Knowledge
- [Document Everything](https://handbook.turtleand.com/organizational-knowledge/document-everything/)
- [Compound Your Context](https://handbook.turtleand.com/organizational-knowledge/compound-your-context/)
- [Agent-Friendly Content](https://handbook.turtleand.com/organizational-knowledge/agent-friendly-content/)
- [If AI Becomes the Framework](https://handbook.turtleand.com/organizational-knowledge/ai-as-framework/)
- [Living Institutional Memory](https://handbook.turtleand.com/organizational-knowledge/living-institutional-memory/)

## Human Element
- [Humans Set the Direction](https://handbook.turtleand.com/human-element/humans-set-the-direction/)
